ProjectTitle: Creation of a humanized mouse model for demyelinating peripheral neuropathies as a platform for therapeutic testing.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 14/02/2025 [REDACTED] you are only describing RDM for your own team. [REDACTED] a DMP typically encompasses RDM for all project partners so you can use the DMP to understand which partners generate which datasets and where it is eventually stored, archived and shared [REDACTED] please include the approval number for the animal studies. [REDACTED] please note that the minimum preservation time of 5 years is the FWO guideline, the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy requires a 10-year preservation period for all relevant data. [REDACTED] more details see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
label: good with suggestions
